sn35.55:1.1: “Katham nu kho, bhante, janato, katham passato samyojana samugghatam gacchanti”ti?
sn35.55:1.2: “Cakkhum kho, bhikkhu, anattato janato passato samyojana samugghatam gacchanti.
sn35.55:1.6: yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anattato janato passato samyojana samugghatam gacchanti.
sn35.55:1.15: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anattato janato passato samyojana samugghatam gacchanti.
sn35.55:1.16: Evam kho, bhikkhu, janato evam passato samyojana samugghatam gacchanti”ti.
